## IMeta interface

Generic interface for types supporting metadata. Implementations MUST exclude metadata from any comparisons, equality checks &amp; hashing.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IMeta<T> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [meta()](./api.imeta.meta.md) |  |
|  [withMeta(meta)](./api.imeta.withmeta.md) | Returns a copy of the original value with given metadata attached. |
